intro_paragraph: At Paws & Claws Pet Grooming, we understand that your pets are like family, which is why we offer top-notch grooming services to keep them looking and feeling their best.
Our full grooming package includes a bath, haircut, nail trim, and ear cleaning, all done with gentle care and attention to detail.
Trust us to pamper your furry friends and bring out their natural beauty. Contact us today to schedule an appointment!
